call_summary: Ravi from MakeMyTrip is calling a customer regarding a hotel cancellation request.
The hotel and area manager have denied the cancellation request.
The hotel claims the customer ordered food and is going to stay there, but the customer disputes this and says they did not order food.
Ravi says he tried to convince the hotel but they will not allow cancellation or provide a refund due to their cancellation policy.
The customer insists Ravi check again with the hotel on whether food was ordered. Ravi says he is unable to reach the hotel.
Ravi reiterates that unfortunately the cancellation has been denied by the hotel so a refund cannot be provided.
The call ends with Ravi asking if he can assist the customer with anything else, but the customer says the cancellation/refund is the only help needed
description.remarks: The agent was polite but unable to resolve the customer's cancellation request as the hotel denied it, citing ordered food. The customer insisted food was not ordered. The issue remained unresolved.
description.resolution: Agent may say the following to the customer: I apologize that the hotel refused to cancel or refund your booking despite not providing the food ordered. I will escalate this issue to management to resolve it React The customer's name is not provided. The agent's name is Ravi.
issue: The customer requested a cancellation, but the hotel denied it. The agent was unable to get the cancellation approved.
There seems to be confusion around whether food/lunch was ordered or not. The customer says they did not order food, but the hotel claims they did. The agent was unable to get clarification on this.
The agent put the customer on hold to reconfirm with the hotel, but was unable to connect with them. The customer had to wait on hold without resolution.
Overall, the agent was unable to resolve the customer's request for cancellation. The call ended without a satisfactory resolution for the customer.
There appears to be a communication gap, with the customer and agent unable to understand each other at some points.
The agent could have been more empathetic to the customer's situation and frustration over the lack of cancellation/refund.
More effort could have been made to find a mutually acceptable solution, like partial refund, voucher, rebooking, etc.

sentiment.brief: The caller seems frustrated and dissatisfied with the service, indicating a negative sentiment. The agent appears to be apologizing and attempting to assist, but is unable to provide a resolution, leading to further frustration for the caller.
sentiment.analysis: The high negative score reflects the caller's dissatisfaction and unresolved issue. The low positive and neutral scores indicate there were minimal positive or neutral statements. Overall, the transcript conveys a strongly negative sentiment from the customer's perspective.

qa_plain.ques1: Did the associate utilize the typical salutations and closing remarks? Just provide a number in response—3 if you agree, 0 otherwise.
qa_plain.ques2: Did the associate employ proper sentence structure, grammar, spelling, capitalization, and absence of erroneous spacing or uneven font? When entering the variable value, did the associate delete the brackets, numerous information metrics data, etc.? Furthermore, no phrases linked to internal processes that the DPs are unfamiliar with were used? Did the associate compose the entire response in a single language? Just provide a number in response—5 if you agree, 0 otherwise
qa_plain.ques3: Did the associate respond using the appropriate language?Just provide a number in response—3 if you agree, 0 otherwise
qa_plain.ques4: New ticket: Did the associate write the response on their own in accordance with the delivery person's question and scenario? Pasting a copy of a previous response will be deemed fatal. Simply respond with one word: NON-FATAL if you disagree, and FATAL otherwise
qa_plain.ques5: Did the associate pose the pertinent queries to determine the underlying cause? It is not required to probe?Just provide a number in response—3 if you agree, and 5 otherwise
qa_plain.ques6: Did the associate respond to the delivery person's inquiry with all the information needed? Did the associate give accurate information regarding the amount, due date, week, RRN, and order ID? Is the real question answered? False claims like 'technical issue' or 'unable to fetch the details' weren't made.Simply respond with one word: NON-FATAL if you disagree, and FATAL otherwise
qa_plain.ques7: The ticket was not closed, reassigned, unassigned, or closed without a response. Simply respond with a '3'
qa_plain.ques8: Did the associate process a refund, escalate the matter, overturn a denial or dispute, etc.? Was the escalation or action truly necessary? Did the associate choose the appropriate component and make the correct inputs when escalating? several levels of escalation.Only respond by text; if you agree, it would be NON-FATAL; if not, it will be FATAL
qa_plain.ans8: Based on the transcript, the associate did not process a refund or overturn a denial/dispute. The associate explained multiple times that the booking was non-refundable per the cancellation policy and that after check-in, most hotels do not allow cancellation. The associate offered to contact the hotel if the customer could provide photos showing issues with the room, but did not actually escalate or take any action yet. The escalation does not seem necessary at this point since the customer has not checked in yet or provided any evidence of issues. The associate appears to be following policy correctly.
qa_plain.ques9: Did the associate choose the appropriate course of action?Simply respond with one word: NON-FATAL if you disagree, and FATAL otherwise
qa_plain.ques10: Did the associate choose the appropriate tags?Simply respond with one word: NON-FATAL if you disagree, and FATAL otherwise
qa_plain.ques11: Was the ticket status accurately marked by the associate? [Acquired/WOC]. Just provide a number in response—3 if you agree, 0 otherwise
qa_plain.ans11: I do not have enough context to determine if the ticket status was accurately marked. The transcript does not contain information about the ticket status.
qa_plain.ques12: Used profanity. Simply respond with one word: NON-FATAL if you disagree, and FATAL otherwise
